rooms.description: Grand entrance with a reception area incorporating traditional Chettinad motifs and modern luxury finishes. Features a built-in coat closet, comfortable seating arrangement, and ambient lighting.
Spacious living area with high ceilings, modern decor juxtaposed with Chettinad-inspired wood carvings and intricate jali work. Ideal for family gatherings.
Dining space adjoining the living room, designed with an open-plan layout. Features a central dining table with traditional Indian art pieces and ambient lighting.
Guest bedroom designed for occasional visitors, featuring a comfortable queen-size bed, walk-in closet, and modern amenities.
Fully equipped modern kitchen with traditional design elements. The layout is optimized for natural light and efficient workflow, including an island counter.
Service area for laundry, storage, and pantry. Designed with ample space for appliances and storage solutions.

openings.description: Large double glass doors with a modern yet traditional wooden finish, aligned with the plot's corner for optimal flow and adherence to Vastu principles.
Large floor-to-ceiling windows in the living area offering abundant natural light and views of the landscaped garden.
Skylight openings designed for cross ventilation and natural lighting in living areas.

rooms.description: Luxurious master bedroom with an attached en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet. Incorporates traditional Chettinad detailing, such as carved wood panels.
Additional master bedroom with its own private balcony overlooking the terrace. Features modern design aesthetics with traditional accents.
Spacious bedroom designed for children, featuring playful decor and storage solutions while keeping in line with Vastu guidelines.
Dedicated study area that is serene and well-lit, suitable for work or hobbies. Integrates modern ergonomics with Chettinad-inspired interiors.
Modern home office space designed for remote work, featuring a large desk, ergonomic seating, and ample storage. The design respects Vastu by ensuring proper light flow.
Luxurious en-suite bathroom for Master Bedroom 1, featuring modern fixtures and a walk-in shower.
En-suite bathroom for Master Bedroom 2, designed with contemporary amenities and natural light.

openings.description: Operable windows in each bedroom ensuring cross ventilation and adherence to Vastu principles.
Ventilation openings in bathrooms for proper airflow, ensuring a comfortable environment and compliance with Vastu.

rooms.description: A luxury rooftop terrace offering panoramic views of the surroundings. Includes space for outdoor dining, lounge areas, and a mini-barbeque corner.

openings.description: Elevated access stairs leading from the upper floor to the rooftop terrace, designed for safety and ease of movement.
